name: Balloon Collector (chaoticc_neutral)
description:
You just have a net, and one purpose: catch balloons coming from above randomly, add them in your balloon bunch, and rise as high as possible. 

This game is made as a clone of "Balloon Shooter" game from old Siemens phones, the one of my most favourite games when I was a child.

Controls:

- use direction keys for movement

- hold "space" to prepare your net to swing, when it ready, release "space" and swing your net. If you release your net before it ready, it will go initial position without catching balloons.

- thats all you have to know to rise to the sky

- this game made in Godot Engine

- catch and miss sound effects made in ChipTone by SFBGames

- the sound when lose link to freesound.org

- font

devChaoticNeutral@gmail.com
